definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: The British had departed New York, and the general bade farewell to his men.
sentences.chinese: 當時，英軍已撤離紐約，將軍也與部下道別。

sentences.english: The British army so large-scalely invades and depart his mainland again at present.
sentences.chinese: 英軍這麼大規模的入侵，離他的本土又這麼遠。

sentences.english: In 1777, British troops occupied Philadelphia during the American Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 1777年，在美國革命戰爭中英軍佔領費城。

sentences.english: b. The British army landed on the island successfully.
sentences.chinese: 英軍勝利地登上了小島。

sentences.english: British trucks have a small camo detection radius.
sentences.chinese: 英軍卡車獲得小範圍的反僞裝能力。

sentences.english: He suddenly beheld the table-land of Mont-Saint-Jean cleared, and the van of the English army disappear.
sentences.chinese: 他望見聖約翰山高地突然空虛，英軍的前鋒不見了。

sentences.english: General Penney commanding the British first Division was anxious to push inland.
sentences.chinese: 指揮英軍第一師的彭尼將軍迫切地希望向內地推進。

sentences.english: They didn't surrender themselves to the English troops.
sentences.chinese: 他們始終未向英軍投降。

sentences.english: The British army was directed from Scutari, a large village near Constantinople .
sentences.chinese: 英軍從君士坦丁堡附近的一個大村子斯庫臺開始進發。

sentences.english: He doesn't remember being defeated by the British.
Female British soldiers - as well as male soldiers - are alleged to have taken part in the abuse.
sentences.chinese: 這些都被指控參與了虐囚事件的英軍士兵有男有女。

sentences.english: The 21st Panzer Division was already in action north of Caen against the British bridgeheads .
sentences.chinese: 第21裝甲師在卡昂北部與英軍橋頭堡部隊作戰。

sentences.english: War, the United States allowed the British Forces to use its military satellites.
sentences.chinese: 在馬島戰爭中，美國允許英軍使用其軍用衛星。

sentences.english: British forces had been fighting the Italians and Germans in North Africa since late nineteen forty.
sentences.chinese: 英軍已在北非作戰月底以來四零年意大利人和德國人。

sentences.english: In Malvinas War, the United States allowed the British Forces to use its military satellites.
sentences.chinese: 在馬島戰爭中，美國允許英軍使用其軍用衛星。

sentences.english: O'Neill had always resented the existence of an English force at Portmore.
sentences.chinese: 奧尼爾一向痛恨英軍屯駐在波特莫爾。
